title: Golem Fist
summaries: The Golem Fist is a Hardmode, post-Golem flail that fires a large stone fist attached to a chain that retracts on impact, similar to the one Golem uses. It fires forward at a rapid rate, similar to the KO Cannon and Harpoon. Firing at closer targets causes its fire rate to increase. The Golem Fist has a (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 1/7 (14.29%) / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 1/8 (12.5%) chance of being dropped by Golem.

The Golem Fist has a very short cooldown period; therefore its auto-fire rate is dependent only on the distance to its impact, meaning that an <linked>enemy</linked> or object in close range will cause a faster <linked>autofire</linked> rate.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.
